# Getting started

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
library(rMiW)
library(ExperimentHub)
library(BioImageDbs)
```

# Download 2D image dataset via BioImageDbs

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
#Set EH
eh <- ExperimentHub()

#Query
(qr0 <- query(eh, c("BioImageDbs", "LM_id0001")))
(qr1 <- query(eh, c("BioImageDbs", "LM_id0001_DIC_C2DH_HeLa_4dTensor_Binary")))

#LM_id0001
N <- 1
qr1[N]
str(qr1[N])

#Data download
ImgData <- qr1[[N]]
str(ImgData)

```
